sentences.text: ...ya'ʉ! yamĩ megãmũ ãrĩribʉba yʉ'ʉ yãʉ wa'ʉ ia ãrĩ wa'wayupʉ

sentences.speaker: S1

sentences.text: ʉ̃ʉ̃...! eheayupʉ, ehea te iribu poro ehea siãyãpʉ pare
